message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I really like the product, but $110 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $100.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to pay $92 for it.
I'm not willing to go below $100, Bob. I can offer you a slight discount, though. I'll sell it to you for $98.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to pay $95 for it.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll meet you at $97. That's the lowest I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $97, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to pay $95 for it.
